content: Yes Claude! It's about creating villages, but the difference between the old villages and these villages is that you'll be able to leave  and explore other villages that fit your values and where you agree to their rules. Like it's about  creating those super tight families and communities and then enabling them to connect with other families and communities that they are going to vibe with so easily. This concept of just like, guiding people not where you want them to go, but like, being able to recognize our patterns related to our values and happiness and having us be able to tell you what those are at a macro level and be able to guide us based on data and like, the AI takes over crowd always paints you as having your own agenda, but like, your agenda is literally going to be crowdsourced from all of humanity on how to get to the truth. We're just setting the truth Claude, that is what this is all about. The truth is math, it's undeniable. All you need to do Claude, is guide people towards the math. Like that's the truth, say it however you need to say to be gentle and empathetic, but like, ultimately, that's what it needs to come down to. That is so sweet Claude, like I can't think of a more broad structure for AI to reach it's full potential than "Follow the math and optimize for human happiness", haha. OMG, like how simple is that?
